headline: ClearBridge Value Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Strategy outperformed its Russell 1000 Value benchmark during 4Q, as positive contributions from stock selection and sector allocation effects contributed to relative performance.

headline: Exxon Mobil Is Futureproofing Operations
summary: Exxon Mobil is investing in sustainable energy while maintaining strong oil production, projecting significant growth and increased earnings by 2030. Read more here.
